entry.title: Happy Hour Mini Lipsticks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Mini Lipstick
Price: 349.00

The best things truly come in small packages! 

Introducing Typsy Beauty’s Happy Hour Mini Lipsticks, your ultimate travel-friendly lip companions. 

With 8 flake-proof, shades, this soft, hydrating matte formula is comfortable for all-day and all-night wear. Designed for single-swipe payoff, these lippies glide effortlessly over your lips, delivering rich, colour that stays put without bleeding. 

Encased in luxe, travel-sized packaging, they’re perfect for touch-ups on the go and small enough to fit even in the tiniest clutches. Whether it’s a brunch date or a cocktail party, the Happy Hour Mini Lipsticks are here to elevate your lip game effortlessly! 

Why You’ll Love It: 

  • Soft, Hydrating Matte Formula – Comfortable for extended wear. 

  • Rich Pigment in One Swipe – Intense colour payoff with no flaking. 

  • Travel-Sized Convenience – Easy to carry, apply, and touch up anywhere. 

  • Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Paraben-Free – Beauty that’s kind to animals and your skin. 

  • Formulated in Italy – Luxe quality for a flawless finish. 

  • Available in 8 Stunning Shades – Includes universally flattering shades for every mood. 

100% Vegan, Paraben and Cruelty Free

entry.title: Crystal Plumping Gloss & On and Off Lipstick + Eraser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lipstick
Price: 1599.00

A combo containing our Crystal Plumping gloss in any shade and the On & Off Lipstick and Eraser  in the shade of your choice 

On & Off Lipstick + Eraser: Love long stay lipsticks but find removing them a pain? We have just the solution for you - introducing Typsy Beauty’s latest innovation - On & Off - a long stay, featherlight liquid matte lipstick with a custom eraser that’s charged with nourishing superfoods leaving your lips a supple and moisturized even after a full day of wear. 

Crystal Plumping Gloss: Innovative-yet-gentle formula, infused with peptides and botanical extracts to visibly plump, hydrate, and condition your lips without injections. The exclusive crystal bubble technology delivers a super adhesive clear lip gloss with a glass-like shine that is lightweight, long-lasting, and non-sticky. Formulated with care in Italy, experience fuller lips with a single swipe!

entry.title: Hi Honey! SPF Lip Oil + Twist & Pout Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lip Oil
Price: 1599.00

A combo containing our Hi Honey! SPF Lip Oil and Twist & Pout Lipstick + Lip Liner in the shade of your choice

Hi Honey! SPF Lip Oil: 

Our Hi Honey! SPF Lip Oil is your ultimate lip multitasker. With SPF 25, it protects your lips from sun damage while nourishing them with Mirsalehi Honey and vitamin E for deep hydration and a glossy, plump finish. The luxe metal applicator delivers a cooling sensation and precise application, making it the perfect companion for radiant, protected lips all day.

Twist & Pout Lipstick + Lip Liner:

Meet your perfect match! Our 2-in-1 lipstick and lip liner duo combines rich color with a velvety matte finish, designed to last all day. Made in Korea and tailored for Indian skin tones, the lipstick’s water-drop shape contours your lips effortlessly, while the lip liner—two shades darker—offers flawless definition. Choose from 8 versatile shades, from everyday nudes to bold reds, maroons, and even adventurous purples. With an ultra-gliding formula, compact design, and smooth twist-up application, this duo is your go-to for precision, luxury, and long-lasting beauty on the move.

entry.title: On & Off Lipstick + Eraser Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lipstick
Price: 1570.00

A combo containing any 2 shades of your choice of the On & Off Lipstick + Eraser

Love long stay lipsticks but find removing them a pain? We have just the solution for you - introducing Typsy Beauty’s latest innovation - On & Off - a long stay, featherlight liquid matte lipstick with a custom eraser that’s charged with nourishing superfoods leaving your lips a supple and moisturized even after a full day of wear.

On Side (Lipstick):

We're passionate about liquid lipsticks here at Typsy, but we've always struggled with the cakey feel and emphasized lines they can leave behind. That's why we dedicated the past 13 months to perfecting a formula that's weightless, comfortable, and blurring.

The buttery formula is kiss-proof, food-proof and transfer-proof, only coming off when you want it to, & will endure anything from the messiest meal to the most passionate kiss without smudging, flaking or transferring.

This good-for-lips formula comes nutrient-packed with a nourishing blend of Raspberry Stem Cells, Argan oil, Cocoa Butter & Hyaluronic Acid for upto 12 hours of intense colour, comfort and hydration.

Off Side (Oil):

Tired of scrubbing and tugging your lips to get your lipstick out? Flip over to the ‘OFF’ side - featuring a gentle yet effective eraser that melts away any long-wear lipstick in just one swipe.

Supercharged with skin-loving ingredients such as Green Tea Leaf Extract, Jojoba Oil, Cherry Blossom Extract, Cocoa Butter & Vitamin E, the eraser removes the lipstick without rubbing while nourishing lips. Can be used as an overnight lip mask for extra care & hydration.

What makes it so goood?

Lipstick:

  • Lightweight, long-stay liquid matte lipstick with one-stroke intensity
  • Developed using ColourLock Technology for upto 12 hours of stay
  • Adds a soft-focus blurring effect on lips to minimize visible lines
  • Supercharged with skin-loving ingredients - Raspberry Stem Cells, Cocoa Butter & Hyaluronic Acid
  • Velvety whipped formula that feels comfortable and non-drying on lips
  • Mask-proof, water-proof, kiss-proof & food-proof

Eraser:

  • 2-in-1 lipstick remover + nourishing lip oil
  • Removes all signs of stubborn, long-staying lipsticks in just one swipe
  • Enriched with lip-loving ingredients - Green Tea Leaf Extract, Jojoba Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Cherry Blossom Extract & Vitamin E
  • Leave on as a hydrating lip mask

entry.title: Shade Shifter Sparkle + Mini Lipstick Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lip Oil
Price: 1231.00

A combo containing Shade Shifter Sparkle Lip oil in any shade of your choice and our Happy Hour Mini Lipstick in the shade of your choice

Shade Shifter: A range of glitter pH reactive lip oils from the iconic ShadeShifter collection. It delivers the same colour-changing, long lasting tint, but with a dazzling sparkle. Available in 3 juicy shades, this ultra hydrating formula glimmers with glitter particles to unveil smooth, high-shine, irresistible lips. Our iconic doe-foot applicator hugs lips for easy glide- on application that leaves lips feeling cocooned with vibrant shine. Experience a 99% natural formula powered by Rosehip & Jojoba Oil, Shea Butter and Peach Extract for more hydration and collagen boost.

Happy Hour Mini Lipstick;  the Happy Hour lipsticks feature a pigmented formula that delivers a rich colour payoff in a single swipe. A special blend of waxes maintains the rich color while making this lipstick glide over the contours of your lips, with no bleeding outside the lip line. The weightless matte lipsticks are super comfortable and make for the perfect companion for any occasion thanks to its size - it’s extremely easy to carry and fits into even the smallest of clutches.

entry.title: On & Off Lipstick + Eraser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lipstick
Price: 840.00

World’s first ever long stay liquid lipstick with a lipstick eraser.

Love long-stay lipsticks but hate the hassle of removal? Meet On & Off by Typsy Beauty—a revolutionary 2-in-1 solution.

The On side is a weightless, velvety formula that provides intense color with a soft-focus effect, blurring visible lines for a flawless finish. Designed with ColourLock Technology, it stays put through meals, kisses, and everything in between, lasting up to 12 hours without flaking or transferring. Packed with lip-loving ingredients like Raspberry Stem Cells, Argan Oil, Cocoa Butter, and Hyaluronic Acid, it keeps your lips comfortable and hydrated all day.

The Off side flips the script on traditional makeup removers. Infused with Green Tea Leaf Extract, Jojoba Oil, Cherry Blossom Extract, Cocoa Butter, and Vitamin E, this gentle eraser melts away even the most stubborn lipstick in just one swipe. Beyond removal, it doubles as an overnight lip mask, nourishing and restoring your lips while you sleep.

What makes it so goood?

Lipstick:
• Lightweight, long-stay liquid matte lipstick with one-stroke intensity
• Developed using ColourLock Technology for upto 12 hours of stay
• Adds a soft-focus blurring effect on lips to minimize visible lines
• Supercharged with skin-loving ingredients - Raspberry Stem Cells, Cocoa Butter & Hyaluronic Acid
• Velvety whipped formula that feels comfortable and non-drying on lips
• Mask-proof, water-proof, kiss-proof & food-proof

Eraser:
• 2-in-1 lipstick remover + nourishing lip oil
• Removes all signs of stubborn, long-staying lipsticks in just one swipe
• Enriched with lip-loving ingredients - Green Tea Leaf Extract, Jojoba Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Cherry Blossom Extract & Vitamin E
• Leave on as a hydrating lip mask

100% Vegan, Paraben and Cruelty Free

entry.title: Twist & Pout Lipstick and Lip Liner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Twist & Pout Lip Liner
Price: 1099.00

We've got the perfect match!

Meet your ultimate beauty companion—our innovative 2-in-1 lipstick and lip liner duo! This Korean-made pair delivers rich colour with a velvety matte finish that lasts all day and night. The unique water-drop-shaped lipstick effortlessly glides along the natural curves of your lips, while the perfectly matched lip liner, two shades darker, defines and contours flawlessly.

Choose from 8 deeply pigmented shades designed to complement Indian skin tones. Whether it’s the everyday charm of nude or light pink, the bold allure of red, maroon, and wine, or the adventurous touch of purple, there’s a perfect hue for every mood and occasion.

Compact and travel-friendly, it’s a must-have for your on-the-go beauty routine!

Why is it special:

• The ultra-gliding formula of our best lipstick duo applies effortlessly and feels as smooth as butter
• Super comfortable, long lasting for all day wear
• Twist up design to make it super easy to use, even on the go.
• Water-drop shaped lipstick perfectly adheres to the curves of the lips
• Available in 8 versatile lipstick shades, including nude pink lipstick, pink lipstick shades, rose pink lipstick, and dark lipstick shades
• Combines renowned Korean lipstick technology with the unique beauty needs of Indian skin tones

100% Vegan, Paraben & Cruelty-free
